mapper.select: select exmu, count(*) as cnt from exercise group by exmu
select nvl(expart ,'미설정') expart, count(*) as cnt from exercise where expart in('걷기','달리기','줄넘기','수영','자전거') group by expart
select nvl(expart ,'미설정') expart, count(*) as cnt from exercise where expart in('가슴','어깨','등','허리','위팔 앞','위팔 뒤','아래팔','복부','허벅지 앞','허벅지 뒤') group by expart
select exmu, count(*) as cnt from exercise where id='asd' group by exmu
select nvl(expart ,'미설정') expart, count(*) as cnt from exercise where id='asd' and expart in('걷기','달리기','줄넘기','수영','자전거') group by expart
select nvl(expart ,'미설정') expart, count(*) as cnt from exercise where id='asd' and expart in('가슴','어깨','등','허리','위팔 앞','위팔 뒤','아래팔','복부','허벅지 앞','허벅지 뒤') group by expart
